id.description: Unique identifier for the file link.

expires_at.description: Timestamp indicating the date and time when the file link will expire.

metadata.description: Key-value pairs associated with the file link for storing additional information.

url.description: The URL that can be used to access/download the file linked.

object.description: Indicates the object type, which should be 'file_link'.

created.description: Timestamp representing the date and time when the file link was created.

expired.description: Boolean indicating whether the file link is expired or not.

livemode.description: Boolean indicating whether the file link is in live mode or test mode.
